Ingredients.1: 1 (6.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained, liquid reserved

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Lightly grease four 1 3/4 inch muffin pans.

Directions.2: Place reserved liquid from marinated artichoke hearts in a medium saucepan. Over medium heat, slowly cook and stir onion and garlic until tender.

Directions.3: In a blender or food processor, mix artichoke hearts, eggs, Cheddar cheese, Swiss cheese, Parmesan cheese, parsley, black pepper, Italian-style seasoning, hot pepper sauce and Worcestershire sauce. Blend until smooth. Stir in the onions, garlic and dry bread crumbs.

Directions.4: Fill the muffin pans approximately 3/4 inch full with the mixture. Bake in the preheated oven 12 to 15 minutes, until firm and lightly browned. Serve warm.
